original_text: They take their sheep and cows to offer as sacrifices to the Lord. They want the Lord to help them, but he does not answer them. They cannot find him because he has gone away from them.
korean_text: 그들이 양 떼와 소 떼를 끌고 여호와를 찾으러 갈지라도 만나지 못할 것은 이미 그들에게서 떠나셨음이라

sentences.original_text: They take their sheep and cows
to offer as sacrifices to the Lord
They want the Lord to help them
but he does not answer them
because he has gone away from them
